pages.text:
Once you made a decent amount of $(item)gravel/$, $(item)sand/$ and $(item)limesand/$, you are ready to sift through these, and gain your first non-gold $(thing)metal nuggets/$.$(p)Set up an $(item)encased fan/$ and have it blow (or suck) through water. Items in the resulting stream of water particles will slowly get washed.$(p)What are you waiting for?$(br)              $(t:8x Iron Ingot
8x Copper Ingot
8x Zinc Ingot)$(bold)[Requirements]/$

pages.title: Encased Fan
pages.text: The $(item)fan/$'s speed doesn't affect how fast items convert.
